v.v: Israel, return to Yahweh your God,
Take with you words and return to Yahweh.
I will be like the dew to Israel;
The people who live in his shade will return;
Ephraim, what more have I to do with idols?
Who is wise that he may understand these things?

v: for you have fallen because of your iniquity.
Say to him, “Take away all our iniquity
and accept what is good,
so that we may offer to you the fruit of our lips.
we will not ride on horses to war.
Neither will we say anymore to the work of our hands,
‘You are our gods,’
for in you the fatherless person finds compassion.”
I will love them freely,
for my anger has turned away from him.
he will blossom like the lily
and take root like a cedar in Lebanon.
his beauty will be like the olive trees,
and his fragrance like the cedars in Lebanon.
they will revive like grain
and blossom like vines.
His fame will be like the wine of Lebanon.
I will answer him and care for him.
I am like a cypress whose leaves are always green;
from me comes your fruit.”
Who understands these things so that he may know them?
For the ways of Yahweh are right,
and the righteous will walk in them,
but the rebellious will stumble in them.
